job_title: Java Developer with strong Kafka exp
jd:
Hello Folks,

(Must have exp with Retail client, Springboot, Microservices, Kafka skills) - Note it
Hope you all are doing good.

Please go through the Job description and let me know your interest.

Title: Java Developer with strong Kafka exp
Work Location: Bentonville, AR (Day 1 Onsite)
Duration: Long Term Contract

Job Description:
Skills and experiences:
• 8+ years of experience in IT with 5+ years of experience in Java, Springboot & Microservices
• Solid experience in large scale distributed systems and event-driven architectures
• Experience with module designing, code reviews, unit testing and deployment
• Experience with any cloud is preferred.

Mandatory skills: Java, Spring boot, Microservices, Kafka, Hibernate, REST API, JSON

Thanks & Regards,
Rahul Kumar
Sr. Technical Recruiter
SPAR Information Systems
(a E-verify Company)
Email : rahul.k@sparinfosys.com
